title: Dubai Luxury Escape
shortDescription: Experience the ultimate luxury in Dubai with 5-star accommodations, desert safaris, and iconic landmarks.
description: Indulge in the ultimate luxury experience in Dubai, the crown jewel of the UAE. This exclusive package includes 5-star accommodations, thrilling desert safaris, and access to the world's most iconic landmarks. From the towering Burj Khalifa to the man-made Palm Jumeirah, experience Dubai's opulence and innovation.
exclusions: Lunch and dinner (except desert safari dinner)

itinerary.title: Arrival in Dubai
itinerary.description: Arrive at Dubai International Airport and transfer to your luxury hotel. Evening at leisure to explore the city.

itinerary.title: Dubai City Tour
itinerary.description: Explore Dubai's iconic landmarks including Burj Khalifa, Dubai Mall, and traditional souks.

itinerary.title: Desert Safari Adventure
itinerary.description: Experience the magic of the Arabian Desert with dune bashing, camel riding, and traditional entertainment.

itinerary.title: Palm Jumeirah & Luxury
itinerary.description: Visit the iconic Palm Jumeirah and enjoy luxury experiences at Atlantis, The Palm.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Check out from hotel and transfer to airport for departure.

seo.title: Dubai Luxury Package 2024 | 5-Star Desert Safari & Burj Khalifa
seo.description: Experience luxury in Dubai with our exclusive package including 5-star hotels, desert safari, Burj Khalifa access, and city tours. Book now!
